title: Add --temperature and --max-tokens flags for model parameter control
description:
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** to control temperature and max-tokens per query
**So that** I can tune creativity and response length dynamically

**Context:**
Documentation shows these flags:
- Line 266-269: consoul chat --temperature 0.2 "Write a binary search"
- Line 278-281: consoul chat --max-tokens 200 "Brief summary"

These allow per-query tuning without config changes.

**Proposed Implementation:**

Add both flags to ask and chat commands:
- --temperature: Float 0.0-2.0 (control randomness)
- --max-tokens: Integer (control response length)

Examples:
consoul ask --temperature 0.1 "Generate production code"
consoul ask --temperature 0.9 "Brainstorm project names"
consoul ask --max-tokens 100 "Brief answer only"

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- --temperature accepts 0.0-2.0, validates range
- --max-tokens accepts positive integers
- Invalid values show clear error messages
- Flags override profile defaults
- Work with both ask and chat commands

**Story Points:** 1
